pages.text: On $(k:use), the $(item)Sigil of Storms$() draws on the power of nature to summon a lightning bolt in the direction you are looking.$(br2)If an entity is struck, the lightning will propagate through nearby creatures, splitting the damage equally.$(br2)The number and damage of the lightning bolts increases
depending on the weather, increasing if it is raining or thundering.$(br2)Should the lightning bolt strike a water source block, it will spawn a fish.$(br2)$(bold)Cost:$() $(blood)500 LP$()/use
